channel.title: CVE Feed for arraytics -- WP Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking Calendar and Online Scheduling Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for arraytics -- WP Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking Calendar and Online Scheduling Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-1094|2024-06-14T04:36:54.514Z -- arraytics -- wp%20timetics-%20ai-powered%20appointment%20booking%20calendar%20and%20online%20scheduling%20plugin
item.description: The Timetics- AI-powered Appointment Booking with Visual Seat Plan and ultimate Calendar Scheduling plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the make_staff() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.21. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to grant users staff permissions.
